issue.title: [Plasma] Refactor object notification code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2542](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2542). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Replace unique_ptr<uint8_t[]> with vector<uint8_t>
